description: Test extension that fetches data from ipc-provider via IPC
author: danibytes

operations.name: fetch_record
operations.description: Fetches a record from ipc-provider via IPC

key.description: Record key to fetch from the provider

operations.name: fetch_all_keys
operations.description: Fetches all available keys from ipc-provider via IPC

operations.name: aggregate
operations.description: Fetches multiple records from ipc-provider and sums their values

keys.description: Array of record keys to aggregate

operations.name: discover
operations.description: Lists all available extensions via IPC discovery
